mapper.select: INSERT INTO movie_info(movie_id, movie_title, movie_title_en, release_date, runtime, cum_audience , view_rating, plot, poster_url, trailer_url, star_rating_avg) VALUES(movie_id_seq.nextval, #{movie_title}, #{movie_title_en}, #{release_date}, #{runtime}, #{cum_audience} , #{view_rating}, #{plot}, #{poster_url}, #{trailer_url}, #{star_rating_avg})
